# Building a great Mac app with SwiftUI

**Sample Code**

Create engaging SwiftUI Mac apps by incorporating side bars, tables, toolbars, and several other popular user interface elements.

## Overview



## Creating a table

- **Table**: A container that presents rows of data arranged in one or more columns, optionally providing the ability to select one or more members.
- **tableStyle(_:)**: Sets the style for tables within this view.

items.description: A container that presents rows of data arranged in one or more columns, optionally providing the ability to select one or more members.
